title: Amanda Seales
description:
Kevin Hart is joined by comedian and host of 'Smart, Funny, and Black Radio' Amanda Seales to celebrate the launch of her new show on Laugh Out Loud Radio. The two discuss how she started her career as a child actor, her unapologetic comedy style, the importance of her HBO special 'I Be Knowin', and her journey as a black female comic in this industry.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Amanda Seales)
